developer.name: Abhinav P K
developer.title: Python Backend Developer
developer.bio: Python Developer specializing in Back-end Development with expertise in Python, Django, and Django REST Framework. Successfully transitioned to development through self-study and professional training, showcasing adaptability and a commitment to growth in collaborative development environments. Currently expanding my skill set in AI and Large Language Models (LLMs), including hands-on experience with prompt engineering and integrating AI capabilities into real-world applications.
